entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late in the morning then northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
